Tunable.name: REINCARNATION_COUNT_STATISTIC
Tunable.description: The statistic on a reincarnated Sim that represents the number of times they reincarnated.

Tunable.name: REINCARNATION_START_AFFORDANCE
Tunable.description: Affordance that will be applied to reincarnated sim when reincarnated sim enter's live mode the first time. This is the interaction that will be used to show animation when reincarnated sim arrives lot the first time.

Tunable.name: REINCARNATION_TRAIT
Tunable.description: Trait that gets added to the new sim, when the current sim reincarnated.

TunableEnum.description: traits with these tags will be passed onto sims' next incarnation of life and will be available to apply to the new sim through peer into soul interaction.

Tunable.name: SAVE_LOCK_TOOLTIP
Tunable.description: The tooltip/message to show when the player tries to save the game while reincarnation is happening
